page.title: 20NOTTINGHAM SALVATION ARMY
page.content: I live at the Salvation Army next door to William Booth's house where he was born.He started the Salvation Army to look after people who need help.My Dad takes the old people shopping in the Salvation Army ambulance.My mum cleans in our house and sings on Sundays. Sometimes at the meetings with Dad they talk about God and Jesus.A lot of old peole live in the old folks home because they can't do anything for themselves so some young ladies make their dinner and look after them. When people's houses go on fire sometimes they can live for a few months in a flat in the Salvation Army. My friend Jason lives in a flat and I play with him.When there is a fire my Dad and Captain Halliday go with some sandwiches and drink for them.
